PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12642022-12-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC, 
ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
SubjectSocial Security Tribunal Regulations, 2022
PrecisSOCIAL SECURITY TRIBUNAL REGULATIONS, 2022 in order to (1) repeal and replace the current Social Security Tribunal Regulations; (2) clarify the process to be followed by the Social Security Tribunal (SST) when filing notices of constitutional questions; (3) specify the form of hearing which may be requested by appellants; (4) outline the context in which hearings may be held wholly or partially in private; (5) enable the development and implementation of SST's Rules of Procedure by SST's Chairperson, with the approval of the Minister of Employment and Social Development.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0255 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
